Welcome to 'Sounds of the Deep Night' — a radio experience exploring the ambient side of darkness.

A soft wind brushes through the trees as the night begins to stir.

_img=https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2020/05/01/06/47/forest-5112017_1280.jpg_

Crickets rise like a choir from the underbrush, their rhythm steady.
_audio=https://freesound.org/data/previews/533/533078_1416600-lq.mp3_
_img=https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2016/03/09/09/30/cricket-1244261_1280.jpg_

In the distance, a lone owl calls from the shadows.
_audio=https://freesound.org/data/previews/250/250885_4486188-lq.mp3_
_img=https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2016/10/12/21/24/owl-1738888_1280.jpg_

A foggy path reflects moonlight as footsteps echo across damp earth.
_audio=https://freesound.org/data/previews/414/414209_5121236-lq.mp3_
_img=https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2019/11/17/09/22/mist-4631068_1280.jpg_

A creek flows quietly beneath a broken bridge, whispering into the night.
_audio=https://freesound.org/data/previews/132/132117_2398400-lq.mp3_
_img=https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2015/09/18/18/25/stream-944233_1280.jpg_

As dawn begins to stir, the first bird’s song breaks the stillness.
_audio=https://freesound.org/data/previews/456/456142_5121236-lq.mp3_
_img=https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/02/09/01/25/bird-2052589_1280.jpg_
Thank you for drifting with us through the deep night. Until next time, stay tuned to the quiet between the stars.
